title: Or kaNam unnai
sahitya:
Or kaNam unnaip-pirindu vAzhEnE oppillAda uyirt-tOzhanE


anupallavi

  Ar unakkiNai yAvAr ulagil arputamAghiya cirp-parAdhItanE


caraNam    pirap-pirappillAda nityA ulagil yArum pEshiDa uNarAda satyA
parabrahmamna shuddhanE Om Om Om paramaduriya shikhara jyOtiyE
paNNukkoliyena kaNNukk-oLiyena eNNukk-uNarvAna viNNavnE nAn
